proposal: Understanding the noble cause of 0x1776 America, where ETH donations support veterans, we see a synergy. With 509 holders in the ETH network, your community's impact is commendable. Imagine amplifying this by deploying your own DEX or initiating a community-driven lottery, where proceeds could further benefit veterans. Together, we can build tools that not only grow your project but also contribute to a cause close to many hearts.
